name: Get sync job fails for unprivileged user

error.reason: action [cluster:admin/xpack/connector/sync_job/get] is unauthorized for user [entsearch-unprivileged] with effective roles [unprivileged], this action is granted by the cluster privileges [monitor_connector,manage_connector,manage,all]

root_cause.reason: action [cluster:admin/xpack/connector/sync_job/get] is unauthorized for user [entsearch-unprivileged] with effective roles [unprivileged], this action is granted by the cluster privileges [monitor_connector,manage_connector,manage,all]
